svg.title: 2FA Login Sequence - Complete Flow with Session Regeneration
svg.desc: Complete two-factor authentication flow showing password authentication, TOTP verification with replay prevention, backup codes, and proper session regeneration at both authentication boundaries
svg.text: WHERE username = ? AND success = 0 AND timestamp > now() - 15min
Prevents session fixation after password auth
Show 2FA form (6-digit code + backup code option)
1. User enters backup code in format: ABCD-EFGH
SELECT backup_codes FROM users WHERE id = ?
JSON array of SHA256 hashes (10 codes generated initially)
Remove used code_hash from array ‚Üí UPDATE users SET backup_codes = ?
Return remaining code count to user
‚Üí Same session regeneration flow as TOTP (twofa_routes.py:106)
‚Üí Log security event: '2fa_backup_used' with remaining count
‚Ä¢ Regeneration Point #2: After TOTP verification (twofa_routes.py:133) or backup code (line 106)
‚Ä¢ Security: Prevents attacker from fixing session ID before authentication completes
‚Ä¢ Cache cleanup: Removes entries older than 90 seconds (3 windows)
‚Ä¢ Prevention: Same code cannot be used twice in same time window
‚Ä¢ valid_window=1: Accepts codes from current window and ¬±1 adjacent windows
‚Ä¢ Tolerance: ¬±30 seconds (1 step before and after current window)
‚Ä¢ Balances security with clock skew tolerance (RFC 6238 recommendation)
‚Ä¢ Backup Codes: SHA256 hashed, single-use (10 total)
‚Ä¢ TOTP Secret: Fernet encrypted at rest
‚Ä¢ Pending session: Temporary storage between phases
‚Ä¢ Final session: Only created after both factors pass
